Module dev.kkorolyov.pancake.core
Package dev.kkorolyov.pancake.core.component

Class Bounds

java.lang.Object
dev.kkorolyov.pancake.core.component.Bounds
All Implemented Interfaces:
dev.kkorolyov.pancake.platform.entity.Component
public final class Bounds extends Object implements dev.kkorolyov.pancake.platform.entity.Component
A closed boundary. Boundaries can be one of: Round - a single value representing the radius of a sphere Poly - an undirected graph of vectors from a common origin of (0, 0, 0) representing vertices of a polyhedron

    • getVertices

      public dev.kkorolyov.pancake.platform.math.Vector3[] getVertices()
      Returns all the vertices in this boundary. WARNING: Any modifications to the returned array or its elements may contend with getNormals() and getMagnitude().

    • getNormals

      public dev.kkorolyov.pancake.platform.math.Vector2[] getNormals()

    • isRound

      public boolean isRound()
